amendment.description: Amendment changes the bill to remove all counties except Amherst County, Virginia. As modified, amendment includes certain parcels in Rockbridge County, Virginia to the description.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 111-131 to amend section 506(a) of the bill to remove all counties except Amherst County, Virginia.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Goodlatte amendment (A002) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Goodlatte amendment (A002) modified by unanimous consent. The modification to the amendment includes adding certain parcels in Rockbridge County, Virginia to the description.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Goodlatte.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Goodlatte amendment (A002) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
